notes: Counts if card provides net mana acceleration (repeatable or burst).
why_it_matters: Ensures deck functions regardless of commander synergy.

notes: Multi-modal flow counts; weighting can be profile-specific.

notes: Minimum wipe count depends on pod model.
why_it_matters: Resets when behind; critical survivability lever.

notes: Protection includes stack protection and board protection.
Includes permanent recursion and spell recursion.
Counts pieces that create repeatable value loops (not necessarily infinite).

notes: Profile-dependent; adjust for meta snapshot if available.

notes: Protects pilot (life total and combat position). Includes fogs, pillowfort, lifegain engines, combat punishers.
